name: Eggo Adventure
description:
I promise you it's  100% safe.

Welcome to my first 2D GAME!! 

Created by yours truly: David Joshua 

This is a university project.

Plot or instructions to play the game.

You as the player must collect up music notes for your master (wizard) who has accidentally cast a spell onto her music notes as these notes are now scattered around the world as you 'EGGO' job to collect these notes while fighting the dangerous creatures at the outside world.

So Goodluck and have fun! and please leave a comment and like my project.
